fr.gouv.vitam.tools.sedalib.xml

Class SEDAXMLStreamWriter

  • Object
    • SEDAXMLStreamWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class SEDAXMLStreamWriter
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    The Class SEDAXMLStreamWriter.

    Wrapper class for XMLStreamWriter for high level functions used in all SEDA metadata writers and to be able to indent generated XML. It can write either XML document, either XML fragments. It's based on WoodStox STAX objects.
